Here's how you know

Official websites use .gov
A .gov website belongs to an official government organization in the United States.

Secure .gov websites use HTTPS
A lock ( ) or https:// means you've safely connected to the .gov website. Share sensitive information only on official, secure websites.

    Collaborating Across Industries to Improve Veteran Health Care

    Explore Our Locations

    Our Mission

    National Centers for Innovation to Impact (NCI2I) fosters collaboration between partners and select VA Medical Centers to address VHA's most pressing health care challenges. While each Center is designed to have a unique "sweet spot," the tie that binds these Centers together is the collective objective to bridge VHA strategic priorities with frontline solutions that are transformational, scalable, and responsive to Veterans' needs. This vision can only be realized through frontline-lead incubation, co-development, and testing of solutions with Veterans themselves and support from a diverse cadre of internal and external partners from academia, industry, nonprofits, and other government agencies. These partners can serve as force multipliers and will help build both the culture and capacity for innovation across VHA.

    National Center for Collaborative Health Care Innovation

    NCCHI collaborates throughout VA, across government offices, and with the private and public sector to create a far-reaching positive impact on Veteran care.

    Visit the NCCHI Website

    New England Center for Innovation Excellence

    NECIE operationalizes health care innovation by targeting technology solutions for chronic conditions, improving rural access to care, and offering tailored solutions for aging Veterans.

    Visit the NECIE Website

    Digital and Remote Health Center for Innovation

    DRHCI acts as a central resource hub to streamline clinical implementation of digital and remote patient monitoring (RPM) solutions for Veterans.

    Visit the DRHCI Website

    VA Ventures

    VA Ventures aims to build the infrastructure necessary to bring VA prototyping and product development back within the hospital walls.

    Visit the VA Ventures Website

    Innovation, Development, Education, Advanced Implementation, Solutions (IDEAS) Center

    IDEAS Center for Innovation empowers frontline employees to leverage their clinical expertise, fosters creative problem-solving, and collaborates with industry and academia to develop solutions that drive health care advancements for Veterans.

    Visit the IDEAS Website

    Accelerating Health Care Innovation

    Our National Centers

    Featured Successes

    Augmented Reality and 5G

    Project Convergence brings "science fiction to life" through its cutting-edge 5G and augmented reality program. NCCHI has created one of the first 5G-enabled hospitals in the world at our home base at VA Palo Alto Healthcare System. This partnership brings cutting-edge wireless health care solutions, including augmented reality for clinical training, presurgical planning and operative guidance. The partnership includes innovative wireless health care solutions, including 5G wireless connectivity from Verizon, clinical augmented reality software from Medivis, and HoloLens 2 headsets from Microsoft.

    We’re here anytime, day or night - 24/7

    If you are a Veteran in crisis or concerned about one, connect with our caring, qualified responders for confidential help. Many of them are Veterans themselves.

    • Call 1-800-273-8255 and press 1
    • Text to 838255
    • Chat confidentially now
    • Call TTY if you have hearing loss 1-800-799-4889

    Get more resources at VeteransCrisisLine.net.
